org.felixlimanta.RSAEncryptor.model

Class BigInt

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.felixlimanta.RSAEncryptor.model.BigInt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<BigInt>

    public class BigInt
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<BigInt>
    Represents an immutable arbitrary-precision integer.
    Since:
    2017-06-07
    Author:
    Felix Limanta

      • intValue

        public int intValue()
        Converts a BigInt to an int. If BigInt is larger than 32 bit, only the lowest 32 bit is taken.
        Returns:
        Integer value of BigInt

      • longValue

        public long longValue()
        Converts a BigInt to an long. If BigInt is larger than 64 bit, only the lowest 32 bit is taken.
        Returns:
        Long value of BigInt

        Returns:

      • modInverse

        public BigInt modInverse(BigInt modulus)
        Finds the modular multiplicative inverse of this using extended Euclidean algorithm. Assumes this and modulus are coprimes.
        Parameters:
        modulus - modulus value
        Returns:
        Modular multiplicative inverse

        random - Random number generator
        Returns:
        Random prime number

      • isProbablePrime

        public boolean isProbablePrime()
        Tests if this is a prime number. Test is more accurate the higher certainty is.
        Returns:
        true if this passes the Miller-Rabbin test.

      • isProbablePrime

        public boolean isProbablePrime(int certainty,
                               java.util.Random random)
        Tests if this is a prime number. Test is more accurate the higher certainty is.
        Parameters:
        certainty - Certainty value.
        random - Random number generator
        Returns:
        true if this passes the Miller-Rabbin test.

        Parameters:
        n - Upper limit (exclusive)
        rnd - RNG
        Returns:
        Random BigInt

      • modExp

        public BigInt modExp(BigInt exp,
                     BigInt mod)
        Performs modular exponentiaton (this ^ exp % mod)
        Parameters:
        exp - Exponent, must be non-negative
        mod - Modulus
        Returns:
        this ^ exp % mod
